titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the deduction for health insurance costs in computing self-employment taxes.
Tax Fairness for the Self-Employed Act of 2019
Tax Fairness for the Self-Employed Act of 2019
Tax Fairness for the Self-Employed Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tax Fairness for the Self-Employed Act of 2019
This bill allows the tax deduction for health insurance costs in determining net earnings from self-employment.
